commits.author: Allan Odgaard
commits.summary: Only do special formatting of radar links when we have 3 captures

commits.author: Allan Odgaard
commits.summary: Inline the Show TODO (<kbd class='keyEquivalent'>⌃⇧T</kbd>) command
commits.body: It started to hang after updating the ruby shebang. I didn’t look into why, but inlining the script, rather than go via bash, fixed the problem for me.

commits.author: Allan Odgaard
commits.summary: Pressing <kbd class='keyEquivalent'>⌅</kbd> to open a rdar URL also works when caret is at the end
commits.body: This matches the change done in the Hyperlink-Helper bundle.
